title: Bibliomysteries: Short Tales about Deadly Books
description: The book of virtue / by Ken Bruen The book of ghosts / by Reed Farrel Coleman The scroll / by Anne Perry The book case / by Nelson DeMille Pronghorns of the Third Reich / by C.J. Box Death leaves a bookmark / by William Link An acceptable sacrifice / by Jeffrey Deaver Book club / by Loren D. Estleman The book thing / by Laura Lippman The long sonata of the dead / by Andrew Taylor The final testament / by Peter Blauner The Caxton Lending Library & Book Depository / by John Connolly Rides a stranger / by David Bell What's in a name? / by Thomas H. Cook It's in the book / by Mickey Spillane & Max Allan Collins.Copyright for all stories between 2011 and 2013.
author: Otto Penzler
